item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my website! I am Anders, the guy sketched on the front page. Credits to a friend of mine. I made this website for a plethora of reasons, and I won’t go through them all here, but a reason is that I wanted to hold not be shy of creative stuff I’ve made, and to hold my self accountable for future projects. The logic being that if I shared future plans online, it would be lame to not complete them (without a good reason) after the fact with.

item.title: My Favorite Theorem
item.description: My favorite theorem is the generalized Stokes theorem. See Wikipedia for more information. I have yet to figure out how to get LaTeX to work, so this post is cut short.

item.description: Will add theses and other projects here soon.
